channel.title: Host Evidence Collection And Analysis on Analyst
channel.description: Recent content in Host Evidence Collection And Analysis on Analyst

item.title: File System Collection And Analysis
item.description: Logical Backup - doesn’t copy all, doesn’t copy slack, free space and deleted files. Imaging - bit-by-bit copy.

item.title: Logs Collection And Analysis
item.description: Logs Different logs might be collected depending on the case: Network hack: logs of all network devices (on the route to the hacked device), perimeter router (ISP), Firewall rules might be required.

item.title: RAM Collection And Analysis
item.description: SANS Six-Part Methodology Used to identify malicious processses: Identify rogue processes Analyze DLLs and handles Review network artifacts Look for code injection Check for any signs of a rootkit Dump suspicious process and drivers RAM Acquisition Memory is the best evidence, although the hardest to preserve.

item.title: First Response Process Overview
item.description: First responders first arrive on the scene. Not always they are digital forensic experts. But what if I get so lucky to be the first responder?
